# outline-card



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property         | Attribute          | Description                                                                | Type      | Default     |
| ---------------- | ------------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `bgColorContent` | `bg-color-content` | The color class to apply to the content slot.                              | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `bgColorFooter`  | `bg-color-footer`  | The color class to apply to the footer slot.                               | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `bgColorHeader`  | `bg-color-header`  | The color class to apply to the header slot.                               | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `hasShadow`      | `has-shadow`       | Whether or not this card has a shadow.                                     | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `isRounded`      | `is-rounded`       | Whether or not this is a nested container. If it's nested, remove padding. | `boolean` | `false`     |


## Slots

| Slot        | Description                                  |
| ----------- | -------------------------------------------- |
| `"content"` | The primary slot to render the card content. |
| `"footer"`  | The footer slot.                             |
| `"header"`  | The header slot.                             |
